node.title: China's nuclear expansion outpacing Defense Department projections
node.description: The Pentagon now estimates China will have 1,000 nuclear warheads by 2030 — more than double its estimates from last year.

node.title: The W.H.O. grants Covaxin, a Covid vaccine developed in India, emergency authorization.
node.description: The vaccine is the eighth coronavirus vaccine to receive the global health body’s green light.

node.title: China Could Have 1,000 Nuclear Warheads by 2030, Pentagon Says

node.title: The U.S. blacklists the NSO Group, an Israeli spyware firm.
node.description: NSO and three other companies were added to a list that blocks foreign companies from buying certain types of sensitive American technology without a license.

node.title: Prince Andrew Lawyer Hints at New Line of Attack on Accuser After Fresh Lawsuit
node.description: Prince Andrew's lawyer said in court he will call similar witnesses to a woman suing the duke's accuser Virginia Giuffre for $10 million.

node.title: Meta launches programme for journalism in NZ
node.description: Facebook's new parent company, Meta, has announced a four-part programme to support journalism in New Zealand.

node.title: CDC director on COVID vaccine for kids and taking "time to get it right"
node.description: With the CDC's recommendation, 28 million American children between the ages of 5 to 11 years old are now eligible to receive Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine at a lower dosage.

node.title: Black voters in Virginia refuse to be blamed for a major Democratic defeat.
node.description: Black state leaders and voters said the results were a sign that the party could not rely on minority voters to cover its cratering totals in white areas of the state.

node.title: Buffalo’s mayoral race appears to have swung toward the write-in incumbent, but the count will take time.
node.description: Byron Brown, a Democrat and four-term mayor, lost to India Walton, a democratic socialist, in a June primary. There are far more write-in votes than votes for her, but determining which belong to Mr. Brown could take weeks.

node.title: 3 Art Gallery Shows to See Right Now
node.description: Shannon Cartier Lucy’s luminous scenes of unease; Manoucher Yektai’s lyrical impasto works; and Dread Scott’s “Slave Rebellion Reenactment.”

node.title: Gucci Makes a Hollywood Entrance

node.title: Taurid Meteor Shower To Peak Week Before November 2021's Beaver Moon
